column4: Hello everyone! I am running linux ubuntu on my emachines t3508, but was wondering if there is a better distro for my pc. Any clues or advice?I only ask because there are better working pc's out there now and mines is just about 6 to 7 years old
Are you having any issues with Ubuntu? If it's running slowly then you might prefer Lubuntu, but if it's working well why change it?
that's exactly it in fact, it runs slow, Lubunut is better?
